content: चोलः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}|{%<ab>pl.</ab>%}) [चुल् कर्मणि घञ्] <ab>N.</ab> of a country in southern India, the modern Tanjore. --लः, --ली {@--1@} A short jacket, a bodice. {@--2@} A garment reaching to the feet. --लं A garment.

चोल <ab>N.</ab> of a country, situated on the banks of the Kāverī and said to cover the southern portion of Mysore. It was beyond the Kāverī, as Pulekaśi II. invaded it after crossing the river. The country latterly came to be called Karnāṭaka.
